(I asked Zardus if I could just have the shields down to 70% since I haven't 
seen most of the posts involving the Ramora, and I don't have the free time 
to check on it, and he said "A-OK")

Vehement/Unicron/Sun Crusher/Reflector:




Unicron watched the small hole in the shield close and smiled.  The wheels 
were in motion.  He turned, but felt something.  Pondering on the strange 
sensation he realized there had been two important deaths on the planet.  The 
foolish Autobot Optimus Prime and the traitorous Galvatron.  Though, they 
weren't completely gone.  So, Unicron was pretty much not upset, his revenge 
would still occur.  He had much more pressing matters to attend to at the 
moment.

"Open the nearest hatch Vehement." Unicron said as he made a scan of the 
craft, shields at 70% and slowly rising because of solar panels, and the 
craft being in the middle of the second largest desert on the planet.

---

Vehement flew to a side of the ship, entering several codes and a hatch 
barely able to fit him opened, Vehement letting the others climb in and then 
he followed, ceiling the hatch and had the computer make up an entirely new 
code to open it.
